name: Luggage mania
description:
A game about sorting luggage's while defusing bombs

How to play

Luggage arrive from the main conveyor and you must match their tag with the flights announced in the board above.

Whenever a luggage is above one of the conveyor belts 1,2,3 or 4 you may press the corresponding number on your keyboard to send them in the conveyor belt

Whenever a bombed luggage appears you must click on it in order to defuse it, if you don't you will lose the game.

Whenever you misplace a luggage or refute a bomb one of your employees will become temporarily busy, you have 3 employees. If all of your employees are busy you can't defuse bombs.

Enjoy!
